value.title: XPeng goes from four-wheeled EVs to four-legged robots with $100M in Series A funding
value.excerpt: XPeng Robotics, an affiliate of XPeng Inc., has announced an agreement to receive over $100 million in Series A capital funding, led by a group of longtime investors. The fresh financing will enable XPeng Robotics to further its R&D in robotic hardware and software and talent acquisition while accelerating product development.

value.title: Nokia to open robotics lab at Indian Institute of Science for 5G and AI
value.excerpt: Nokia and the Indian Institute of Science (IISc) on Friday announced the opening of the Center of Excellence (CoE) in Networked Robotics at the IISc Bengaluru. The CoE will promote inter-disciplinary research involving robotics and advanced communication technologies in 5G and Artificial Intelligence (AI).
